title: 3dZeropad
description: Adds planes of zeros to a dataset (i.e., pads it out). Negative 'add' count means to cut a dataset down in size.

I.title: Inferior padding
I.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Inferior edge

S.title: Superior padding
S.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Superior edge

A.title: Anterior padding
A.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Anterior edge

P.title: Posterior padding
P.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Posterior edge

L.title: Left padding
L.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Left edge

R.title: Right padding
R.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Right edge

z.title: z-axis padding
z.description: Adds 'n' planes of zeros on EACH of the dataset z-axis (slice-direction) faces

RL.title: Right/Left symmetric padding
RL.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'a' slices in the Right/Left direction

AP.title: Anterior/Posterior symmetric padding
AP.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'b' slices in the Anterior/Posterior direction

IS.title: Inferior/Superior symmetric padding
IS.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'c' slices in the Inferior/Superior direction

pad2even.title: Pad to evens
pad2even.description: Add 0 or 1 plane in each of the R/A/S directions, giving each axis an even number of slices

mm_flag.title: Padding in mm
mm_flag.description: Pad counts 'n' are in mm instead of slices.

master_dataset.title: Master dataset
master_dataset.description: Match the volume described in dataset 'mset'. 'mset' must have the same orientation and grid spacing as dataset to be padded.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Write result into dataset with prefix 'ppp'. Default is 'zeropad'.
